contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Magic | Type = studio | Longtype = | Artist = [[Twins (musical group)|Twins]] | Cover = Twinsmagicalbumcover.jpg | Released = {{Start date|2004|1}} | Recorded = | Genre = [[Cantopop]] | Length = | Label = [[Emperor Entertainment Group]] | Producer = | Reviews = | Last album = ''[[Singing in the Twins Wonderland (Volume 2)]]''<br>(2003) | This album = '''''Magic'''''<br>(2004) | Next album = ''[[Singing in the Twins Wonderland (Volume 3)]]''<br>(2004) }} '''''Magic''''' is the 11th CD released by the musical group [[Twins (musical group)|Twins]]. It was released in January 2004 and contains 11 songs. It was named Magic to emphasise their new singing style and the theme of the album. ==Track listing== #"Liang Ge Hao" (兩個好) #"Shi Duo Pi Li Pin Guo Cheng" (士多啤梨蘋果橙) #"Yin Ge" (飲歌) #"Qing Gong" (輕功) #"Ling Si Hao Wan" (零四好玩) #"Gimme 5" #"Chen Yong Ren" (陳永仁) #"Shuang Shi Qing Ren Jie" (雙失情人節) #"Mi Yue" (蜜月) #"Shi Jie Er Nu" (世界兒女) #"Shuai Ge Wu Yong" (帥哥無用) (Putonghua version) {{Twins discography}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Magic (Twins Album)}} [[Category:2004 albums]] [[Category:Twins (group) albums]] {{HongKong-album-stub}}
